alert.note: Alert for San Miguel (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albuquerque (Northern and Central New Mexico)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 27 at 12:45AM MDT until May 27 at 1:15AM MDT by NWS Albuquerque
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 115 AM MDT FOR NORTHEASTERN SAN MIGUEL COUNTY... At 1245 AM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 8 miles north of Conchas Dam, or 23 miles southwest of Mosquero, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Ping pong ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Mosquero, Conchas Dam, Conchas, Variadero, Conchas Lake State Park and Bell Ranch. This includes State Road 104 between Mile Markers 47 and 57, and between Mile Markers 70 and 94. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
